examples.en: She eats an apple every morning.
examples.tr: O, her sabah bir elma yer.

examples.en: The apple was sweet and juicy.
Apples grow in cold regions.
He bought a kilo of apples from the market.
This apple is too sour to eat.
examples.tr: Bu elma yemek için çok ekşi.

examples.en: She read a book about history.
The book was full of interesting facts.
He opened the book to page ten.
I borrowed a book from the library.
Books can change the way you think.
My dog likes to play in the park.
The dog barked loudly.
They adopted a stray dog.
Dogs are loyal animals.
He walks his dog every morning.
He drives a red car.
The car is parked outside.
They bought a new car last week.
examples.tr: Geçen hafta yeni bir araba aldılar.

examples.en: Cars cause air pollution.
This car is faster than mine.
